Feature.Name: Potion of Frost Giant Strength
Feature.Text: When you drink the potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than 23. This potion’s transparent liquid has a piece of a gigantic fingernail from a frost giant floating in it.

MagicProperty.Name: Potion of Frost Giant Strength
MagicProperty.Description: When you drink the potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than 23. This potion’s transparent liquid has a piece of a gigantic fingernail from a frost giant floating in it.
MagicProperty.Source: The Rise of Tiamat Online Supplement
